QuestData.Title: To Catch a Dragon
QuestData.Description: Having a dragon guard the fragment was a smart move on the enemy's part. They can keep moving its location any time we get close to it.$B$BCatching Abyssion will be extremely difficult, but I have a plan that might help.$B$BThe Twilight's Hammer uses magical traps to bind stone drakes to the ground while they drain their energy.$B$BIf we can get our hands on one of these, we might be able to ground the Twilight Dragon for just long enough.$B$BGo east of here, to the Alabaster Shelf, and obtain a trap.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: They're using snares to trap the stone drakes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Dragon Snare from the Twilight Dragonstalkers.
QuestData.CompletionText: If the snares are good enough for stone drakes, they might work on Abyssion.
QuestData.RewardText: Let's see if the snare can ground something larger than a drake.
